bug.author: znation
bug.description:
For both categorical and numeric histogram, the axis titles seem to be reversed -- with "Values" for the count, and "Count" for the values. See screenshots: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5673251/54969719-8e90d800-4f3c-11e9-80af-73bbf2e49f16.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5673251/54969720-8e90d800-4f3c-11e9-8683-7dd6b7f850b6.png></denchmark-link>
